text: Unfortunately, I can't be with you in-person on this most special of days. So, instead, I have crawled inside of this website and dropped it into your browser!
See?? Here I am! So come follow me on a little V-day journey!

But first - click here for a Spotify playlist! I filled it with a few songs about how you make me feel (e.g. sweet, goopy, etc.). So, you should listen to it while you read this, and maybe throughout today when you get a chance, too :-)
